text:
First of all, when I started highschool, the notion of future and getting a job was unknow to me. I started to ask myself what do I want to become during the 2nd year of highschool. My first idea was to work at a pet shop because of my experience during a week working here. But after started thinking of it, I couldn't imagine myself working in this environment all my life. So then I took the opportunity of my horse center to help children to learn how to ride a horse during a week. I was with a friend and we passed a few days trying to teach the kids how to ride and take care of their horses. It was a really meaning week to me because I started riding horses when I was 6 or 7, I can't remember well, and I wasn't able to continue taking classes.So helping kids and trying to teach them what I learnt myself when I was younger was a source of joy and it was at this moment that I realised teaching is what I wanted to do for my future job.
I have some friends that have teachers mothers so I asked them some questions and I started to do some researches on the Internet. That is how I found the class of Sciences of Education in Paris 2. I went to the global opening and when I was listening to the presentation of the classes, I was sure this was what I wanted to study for my future. I also had some experiences with children during holidays in a camping. They started talking to me and I had to play some games with them, I had a really great time, they were adorable and the proximity with them wasn't bothering me at all. I also think that the education needs more and more teachers everyday so that is why I wanted to help them through my studies.
